events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the Software Engineer position within our backend team.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering, specifically for the Software Engineer role requiring backend development expertise.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to handle the candidate, coordinating next steps for the software engineer recruitment process.
The initial phone screening with John was completed successfully, discussing his experience with various software development projects.
John responded promptly and positively to our request for availability to schedule the technical interview later this week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10:00 AM, focusing on backend software engineering and system architecture.
